SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.renderers

Class TuiPlayerRenderer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.renderers.TuiPlayerRenderer
public class TuiPlayerRenderer extends Object
The TuiPlayerRenderer class is responsible for rendering the player's information, hand, and objectives on the TUI.
